name: Шампунь Gliss Kur Жидкий Шёлк 400мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Sericin, Panthenol, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamide Mea, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Parfum, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Limonene, Mica, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Coumarin, Linalool.
